Creates a checkout session for hosted payment collection

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}

  children={"Request"}
>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["mode","line_items","success_url","cancel_url"],"properties":{"mode":{"type":"string","enum":["payment","subscription"],"description":"Checkout mode"},"line_items":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","required":["name","amount","currency","quantity"],"properties":{"name":{"type":"string","description":"Name of the item"},"description":{"type":"string","description":"Description of the item"},"amount":{"type":"integer","minimum":1,"description":"Unit amount in smallest currency unit"},"currency":{"type":"string","pattern":"^[A-Z]{3}$","description":"Three-letter ISO currency code"},"quantity":{"type":"integer","minimum":1,"description":"Quantity of the item"}},"title":"LineItem"},"minItems":1},"success_url":{"type":"string","format":"uri","description":"URL to redirect after successful payment"},"cancel_url":{"type":"string","format":"uri","description":"URL to redirect if payment is cancelled"},"customer_email":{"type":"string","format":"email","description":"Customer's email address"},"customer_name":{"type":"string","description":"Customer's full name"},"metadata":{"type":"object","additionalProperties":{"type":"string"}}},"title":"CreateCheckoutSessionRequest"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
